items.name: dashscrop-ai-provider
items.title: Dashscrop ai provider for ai sdk
items.description: Set up dashscrop ai provider for ai sdk. Add model provider to lib. Build with ai-sdk/openai-compatible

items.name: nextjs-generate-text-api-and-component-for-dashscrop-ai-provider
items.title: NextJS Text Generation API and Component with Dashscope AI Integration
items.description: A basic implementation of text generation functionality using Dashscope AI provider. Includes both API endpoint and React component for seamless integration with NextJS applications. Built with Vercel AI SDK.
